shr Reference Model Version 1.0.0
obf

Group AllergyIntoleranceReaction

Documentation:

Observed reaction event associated with the allergy or intolerance, expressed as a condition.

Ancestors:
  • AllergyIntoleranceReaction
Used By:
  • AllergyIntolerance

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      SubstanceCode

      The substance triggering a particular allergy or intolerance reaction event. The substance may be the same as the substance cited in the AllergyIntolerance, but should be a specific substance rather than a class of substances, if known. For example, if the allergy intolerance DataValue substance is 'shellfish' the substance code for the reaction might be 'oyster'.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      SubstanceCode
      0..1
      Manifestation

      Clinical symptoms/signs.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      Manifestation
      1..*
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/clinical-findings (EXAMPLE)
      BeginDateTime

      The time at which something is to take effect, start, or did start. Boundary is considered inclusive.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      BeginDateTime
      0..1
      Severity

      Degree of harshness or extent of a symptom, disorder, or condition.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      Severity
      0..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/reaction-event-severity (REQUIRED)
      RouteIntoBody

      The way a substance enters an organism after contact, particularly, the route of drug administration.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      RouteIntoBody
      0..1
      CommentOrDescription

      A text note containing additional details, explanation, description, comment, or summarization.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      CommentOrDescription
      0..1
